uvi.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.53
uvi.description:
tcp: fix tcp_init_transfer() to not reset icsk_ca_initialized

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.53 by commit ad4ba3404931745a5977ad12db4f0c34080e52f7, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 8919a9b31eb4fb4c0a93e5fb350a626924302aa6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: fix tcp_init_transfer() to not reset icsk_ca_initialized
